title: Introduction to Denmark
creator_credit: Danish Government Film Office and Laterna Film
brief_description: The basic characteristics and major occupations of the people of a complex modern welfare state. The streets of Copenhagen; its people; the production of food; shipyards launching fishing boats; industries, factory mass production and handcraftsmanship; aspects of culture and recreation, all give revealing insights into this progressive and picturesque country.
